name: Summary
query:
SELECT 
    'Patient Appointments' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(remaining_total), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabPatient Appointment`
WHERE 
    appointment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'New Admissions' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(child.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT parent.name) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabNew Admission` parent
    LEFT JOIN `tabAdmission Payments` child ON parent.name = child.parent
WHERE 
    parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Additional Payments' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabAdditional Payments`
WHERE 
    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Expenses' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabExpenses`
WHERE 
    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Discharge Bills' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(grand_total), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabDischarge Bill`
WHERE 
    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Lab Reports' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(lab_tests.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabLab Reports` parent
    LEFT JOIN `tablab tests` lab_tests ON parent.name = lab_tests.parent
WHERE 
    parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Total Income' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN category IN ('Patient Appointments', 'New Admissions', 'Additional Payments', 'Discharge Bills', 'Lab Reports') 
            THEN total_amount 
            ELSE 0 
        END
    ), 0) as total_amount,
    NULL as transaction_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Patient Appointments' as category,
        IFNULL(SUM(remaining_total), 0) as total_amount
    FROM 
        `tabPatient Appointment`
    WHERE 
        appointment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        'New Admissions' as category,
        IFNULL(SUM(child.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
    FROM 
        `tabNew Admission` parent
        LEFT JOIN `tabAdmission Payments` child ON parent.name = child.parent
    WHERE 
        parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        'Additional Payments' as category,
        IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
    FROM 
        `tabAdditional Payments`
    WHERE 
        creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Discharge Bills' as category,
        IFNULL(SUM(grand_total), 0) as total_amount
    FROM 
        `tabDischarge Bill`
    WHERE 
        creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Lab Reports' as category,
        IFNULL(SUM(lab_tests.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
    FROM 
        `tabLab Reports` parent
        LEFT JOIN `tablab tests` lab_tests ON parent.name = lab_tests.parent
    WHERE 
        parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
) as income_summary

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Total Expenses' as category,
    IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
    NULL as transaction_count
FROM 
    `tabExpenses`
WHERE 
    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'Net Amount' as category,
    (
        (
            SELECT IFNULL(SUM(
                CASE 
                    WHEN category IN ('Patient Appointments', 'New Admissions', 'Additional Payments', 'Discharge Bills', 'Lab Reports') 
                    THEN total_amount 
                    ELSE 0 
                END
            ), 0)
            FROM (
                SELECT 
                    'Patient Appointments' as category,
                    IFNULL(SUM(remaining_total), 0) as total_amount
                FROM 
                    `tabPatient Appointment`
                WHERE 
                    appointment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
                
                UNION ALL
                
                SELECT 
                    'New Admissions' as category,
                    IFNULL(SUM(child.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
                FROM 
                    `tabNew Admission` parent
                    LEFT JOIN `tabAdmission Payments` child ON parent.name = child.parent
                WHERE 
                    parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
                
                UNION ALL
                
                SELECT 
                    'Additional Payments' as category,
                    IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
                FROM 
                    `tabAdditional Payments`
                WHERE 
                    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

                UNION ALL

                SELECT 
                    'Discharge Bills' as category,
                    IFNULL(SUM(grand_total), 0) as total_amount
                FROM 
                    `tabDischarge Bill`
                WHERE 
                    creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

                UNION ALL

                SELECT 
                    'Lab Reports' as category,
                    IFNULL(SUM(lab_tests.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount
                FROM 
                    `tabLab Reports` parent
                    LEFT JOIN `tablab tests` lab_tests ON parent.name = lab_tests.parent
                WHERE 
                    parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
            ) as income_total
        ) - (
            SELECT IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0)
            FROM `tabExpenses`
            WHERE creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
        )
    ) as total_amount,
    NULL as transaction_count

ORDER BY 
    FIELD(category, 
        'Patient Appointments',
        'New Admissions',
        'Additional Payments',
        'Expenses',
        'Discharge Bills',
        'Lab Reports',
        'Total Income',
        'Total Expenses',
        'Net Amount'
    )

def execute(filters=None):
    # Define columns
    columns = [
        {"label": "Category", "fieldname": "category", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 200},
        {"label": "Total Amount", "fieldname": "total_amount", "fieldtype": "Currency", "width": 150},
        {"label": "Transaction Count", "fieldname": "transaction_count", "fieldtype": "Int", "width": 150}
    ]

    # Initialize data list
    data = []

    # 1. Patient Appointments Summary
    appointment_query = """
        SELECT 
            IFNULL(SUM(remaining_total), 0) as total_amount,
            COUNT(*) as transaction_count
        FROM 
            `tabPatient Appointment`
        WHERE 
            appointment_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    """
    appointment_data = frappe.db.sql(appointment_query, filters, as_dict=1)[0]

    data.append({
        "category": "Patient Appointments",
        "total_amount": appointment_data.total_amount,
        "transaction_count": appointment_data.transaction_count
    })

    # 2. New Admissions Summary
    admission_query = """
        SELECT 
            IFNULL(SUM(child.payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
            COUNT(DISTINCT parent.name) as transaction_count
        FROM 
            `tabNew Admission` parent
            LEFT JOIN `tabAdmission Payments` child ON parent.name = child.parent
        WHERE 
            parent.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    """
    admission_data = frappe.db.sql(admission_query, filters, as_dict=1)[0]

    data.append({
        "category": "New Admissions",
        "total_amount": admission_data.total_amount,
        "transaction_count": admission_data.transaction_count
    })

    # 3. Additional Payments Summary
    additional_payments_query = """
        SELECT 
            IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
            COUNT(*) as transaction_count
        FROM 
            `tabAdditional Payments`
        WHERE 
            creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    """
    additional_payments_data = frappe.db.sql(additional_payments_query, filters, as_dict=1)[0]

    data.append({
        "category": "Additional Payments",
        "total_amount": additional_payments_data.total_amount,
        "transaction_count": additional_payments_data.transaction_count
    })

    # 4. Expenses Summary
    expenses_query = """
        SELECT 
            IFNULL(SUM(payment_amount), 0) as total_amount,
            COUNT(*) as transaction_count
        FROM 
            `tabExpenses`
        WHERE 
            creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    """
    expenses_data = frappe.db.sql(expenses_query, filters, as_dict=1)[0]

    data.append({
        "category": "Expenses",
        "total_amount": expenses_data.total_amount,
        "transaction_count": expenses_data.transaction_count
    })

    # 5. Calculate Totals
    total_income = (
        float(appointment_data.total_amount) + 
        float(admission_data.total_amount) + 
        float(additional_payments_data.total_amount)
    )
    total_expense = float(expenses_data.total_amount)
    net_amount = total_income - total_expense

    # Add summary rows
    data.append({
        "category": "Total Income",
        "total_amount": total_income,
        "transaction_count": None
    })
    data.append({
        "category": "Total Expenses",
        "total_amount": total_expense,
        "transaction_count": None
    })
    data.append({
        "category": "Net Amount",
        "total_amount": net_amount,
        "transaction_count": None
    })

    return columns, data
